message: I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a one-of-a-kind item that I think you'll really love. I'm willing to let it go for $180.
Thanks for the offer, Alice.  I really appreciate you considering my budget.  While I'm interested, $180 is a bit out of my range. I'm willing to pay $120 for it.  Let me know what you think.
I understand that $180 is a bit steep for you, but I'm not willing to go as low as $120. How about we meet in the middle at $150? I'm willing to compromise to make a deal happen.
